verses.verse: שִׁמְע֤וּ <WH8085> Listen אִיִּים֙ <WH339> O isles אֵלַ֔י <WH413> and to וְהַקְשִׁ֥יבוּ <WH7181> unto me and hearken לְאֻמִּ֖ים <WH3816> ye people מֵרָח֑וֹק <WH7350> from far יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> The LORD מִבֶּ֣טֶן <WH990> me from the womb קְרָאָ֔נִי <WH7121> hath called מִמְּעֵ֥י <WH4578> from the bowels אִמִּ֖י <WH517> of my mother הִזְכִּ֥יר <WH2142> hath he made mention שְׁמִֽי׃ <WH8034> of my name

וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <WH7760> And he hath made פִּי֙ <WH6310> my mouth כְּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> sword חַדָּ֔ה <WH2299> like a sharp בְּצֵ֥ל <WH6738> in the shadow יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> of his hand הֶחְבִּיאָ֑נִי <WH2244> hath he hid וַיְשִׂימֵ֙נִי֙ <WH7760> me and made לְחֵ֣ץ <WH2671> shaft בָּר֔וּר <WH1305> me a polished בְּאַשְׁפָּת֖וֹ <WH827> in his quiver הִסְתִּירָֽנִי׃ <WH5641> hath he hid

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> And said לִ֖י עַבְדִּי־ <WH5650> unto me Thou [art] my servant אָ֑תָּה <WH859> you יִשְׂרָאֵ֕ל <WH3478> O Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> Whom בְּךָ֖ אֶתְפָּאָֽר׃ <WH6286> in whom I will be glorified

וַאֲנִ֤י <WH589> I אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH559> Then I said לְרִ֣יק <WH7385> in vain יָגַ֔עְתִּי <WH3021> I have laboured לְתֹ֥הוּ <WH8414> for nought וְהֶ֖בֶל <WH1892> and in vain כֹּחִ֣י <WH3581> my strength כִלֵּ֑יתִי <WH3615> I have spent אָכֵן֙ <WH403> [yet] surely מִשְׁפָּטִ֣י <WH4941> my judgment אֶת־ <WH854> is with יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> [is] with the LORD וּפְעֻלָּתִ֖י <WH6468> and my work אֶת־ <WH854> with אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> with my God

וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ <WH6258> and now אָמַ֣ר <WH559> And now saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3069> God יֹצְרִ֤י <WH3335> that formed מִבֶּ֙טֶן֙ <WH990> me from the womb לְעֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> [to be] his servant ל֔וֹ לְשׁוֹבֵ֤ב <WH7725> again יַֽעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> Jacob אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> to him Though Israel [לֹא כ] (לֹ֣ו <WH3808> not ק) יֵאָסֵ֑ף <WH622> be not gathered וְאֶכָּבֵד֙ <WH3513> yet shall I be glorious בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the eyes יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God וֵאלֹהַ֖י <WH430> and my God הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become עֻזִּֽי׃ <WH5797> shall be my strength

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said נָקֵ֨ל <WH7043> It is a light thing מִֽהְיוֹתְךָ֥ <WH1961> may reach לִי֙ עֶ֔בֶד <WH5650> that thou shouldest be my servant לְהָקִים֙ <WH6965> to raise up אֶת־ <WH853> שִׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> the tribes יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> of Jacob [וּנְצִירֵי כ] (וּנְצוּרֵ֥י <WH5336> preserved ק) יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לְהָשִׁ֑יב <WH7725> and to restore וּנְתַתִּ֙יךָ֙ <WH5414> I will also give לְא֣וֹר <WH216> thee for a light גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> to the Gentiles לִֽהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> may reach יְשׁוּעָתִ֖י <WH3444> that thou mayest be my salvation עַד־ <WH5704> against קְצֵ֥ה <WH7097> unto the end הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth ס

כֹּ֣ה <WH3541> Thus אָֽמַר־ <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָה֩ <WH3068> the LORD גֹּאֵ֨ל <WH1350> the Redeemer יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel קְדוֹשׁ֗וֹ <WH6918> [and] his Holy One לִבְזֹה־ <WH960> despiseth נֶ֜פֶשׁ <WH5315> to him whom man לִמְתָ֤עֵֽב <WH8581> abhorreth גּוֹי֙ <WH1471> to him whom the nation לְעֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> to a servant מֹשְׁלִ֔ים <WH4910> of rulers מְלָכִים֙ <WH4428> Kings יִרְא֣וּ <WH7200> shall see וָקָ֔מוּ <WH6965> and arise שָׂרִ֖ים <WH8269> princes וְיִֽשְׁתַּחֲוּ֑וּ <WH7812> also shall worship לְמַ֤עַן <WH4616> Because יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> because of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who נֶאֱמָ֔ן <WH539> that is faithful קְדֹ֥שׁ <WH6918> [and] the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּבְחָרֶֽךָּ׃ <WH977> and he shall choose

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּעֵ֤ת <WH6256> time רָצוֹן֙ <WH7522> In an acceptable עֲנִיתִ֔יךָ <WH6030> have I heard וּבְי֥וֹם <WH3117> thee and in a day יְשׁוּעָ֖ה <WH3444> of salvation עֲזַרְתִּ֑יךָ <WH5826> have I helped וְאֶצָּרְךָ֗ <WH5341> thee and I will preserve וְאֶתֶּנְךָ֙ <WH5414> thee and give לִבְרִ֣ית <WH1285> thee for a covenant עָ֔ם <WH5971> of the people לְהָקִ֣ים <WH6965> to establish אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> the earth לְהַנְחִ֖יל <WH5157> to cause to inherit נְחָל֥וֹת <WH5159> heritages שֹׁמֵמֽוֹת׃ <WH8074> the desolate

לֵאמֹ֤ר <WH559> That thou mayest say לַֽאֲסוּרִים֙ <WH631> to the prisoners צֵ֔אוּ <WH3318> Go forth לַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after בַּחֹ֖שֶׁךְ <WH2822> to them that [are] in darkness הִגָּל֑וּ <WH1540> Shew עַל־ <WH5921> Along דְּרָכִ֣ים <WH1870> in the ways יִרְע֔וּ <WH7462> yourselves They shall feed וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all שְׁפָיִ֖ים <WH8205> [shall be] in all high places מַרְעִיתָֽם׃ <WH4830> and their pastures

לֹ֤א <WH3808> Nor יִרְעָ֙בוּ֙ <WH7456> They shall not hunger וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יִצְמָ֔אוּ <WH6770> nor thirst וְלֹא־ <WH3808> Nor יַכֵּ֥ם <WH5221> smite שָׁרָ֖ב <WH8273> neither shall the heat וָשָׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> nor sun כִּי־ <WH3588> for מְרַחֲמָ֣ם <WH7355> them for he that hath mercy יְנַהֲגֵ֔ם <WH5090> on them shall lead וְעַל־ <WH5921> and מַבּ֥וּעֵי <WH4002> them even by the springs מַ֖יִם <WH4325> of water יְנַהֲלֵֽם׃ <WH5095> shall he guide
וְשַׂמְתִּ֥י <WH7760> And I will make כָל־ <WH3605> all הָרַ֖י <WH2022> all my mountains לַדָּ֑רֶךְ <WH1870> a way וּמְסִלֹּתַ֖י <WH4546> and my highways יְרֻמֽוּן׃ <WH7311> shall be exalted

הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold אֵ֕לֶּה <WH428> these מֵרָח֖וֹק <WH7350> from far יָבֹ֑אוּ <WH935> Behold these shall come וְהִֽנֵּה־ <WH2009> and lo אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> these מִצָּפ֣וֹן <WH6828> and lo these from the north וּמִיָּ֔ם <WH3220> and from the west וְאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> and these מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> and these from the land סִינִֽים׃ <WH5515> of Sinim

רָנּ֤וּ <WH7442> Sing שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> O heavens וְגִ֣ילִי <WH1523> and be joyful אָ֔רֶץ <WH776> O earth [יִפְצְחוּ כ] (וּפִצְח֥וּ <WH6476> break forth ק) הָרִ֖ים <WH2022> O mountains רִנָּ֑ה <WH7440> into singing כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נִחַ֤ם <WH5162> hath comforted יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> for the LORD עַמּ֔וֹ <WH5971> his people וַעֲנִיָּ֖ו <WH6041> upon his afflicted יְרַחֵֽם׃ <WH7355> and will have mercy ס
וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said צִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> But Zion עֲזָבַ֣נִי <WH5800> hath forsaken יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> The LORD וַאדֹנָ֖י <WH136> me and my Lord שְׁכֵחָֽנִי׃ <WH7911> hath forgotten

הֲתִשְׁכַּ֤ח <WH7911> forget אִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> Can a woman עוּלָ֔הּ <WH5764> her sucking child מֵרַחֵ֖ם <WH7355> that she should not have compassion בֶּן־ <WH1121> on the son בִּטְנָ֑הּ <WH990> belly גַּם־ <WH1571> again אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> these תִשְׁכַּ֔חְנָה <WH7911> yet will I not forget וְאָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I לֹ֥א <WH3808> I will not אֶשְׁכָּחֵֽךְ׃ <WH7911> forget

הֵ֥ן <WH2005> Behold עַל־ <WH5921> on כַּפַּ֖יִם <WH3709> thee upon the palms of [my] hands חַקֹּתִ֑יךְ <WH2710> Behold I have graven חוֹמֹתַ֥יִךְ <WH2346> thy walls נֶגְדִּ֖י <WH5048> before תָּמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> [are] continually

מִֽהֲר֖וּ <WH4116> shall make haste בָּנָ֑יִךְ <WH1121> Thy children מְהָֽרְסַ֥יִךְ <WH2040> thy destroyers וּמַחֲרִבַ֖יִךְ <WH2717> and they that made thee waste מִמֵּ֥ךְ <WH4480> at יֵצֵֽאוּ׃ <WH3318> shall go forth

שְׂאִֽי־ <WH5375> Lift up סָבִ֤יב <WH5439> round about עֵינַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5869> thine eyes וּרְאִ֔י <WH7200> and behold כֻּלָּ֖ם <WH3605> All נִקְבְּצ֣וּ <WH6908> all these gather themselves together בָֽאוּ־ <WH935> [and] come לָ֑ךְ חַי־ <WH2416> to thee [As] I live אָ֣נִי <WH589> I נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּ֤י <WH3588> will surely כֻלָּם֙ <WH3605> all כָּעֲדִ֣י <WH5716> thee with them all as with an ornament תִלְבָּ֔שִׁי <WH3847> thou shalt surely clothe וּֽתְקַשְּׁרִ֖ים <WH7194> and bind כַּכַּלָּֽה׃ <WH3618> them [on thee] as a bride

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For חָרְבֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH2723> For thy waste וְשֹׁ֣מְמֹתַ֔יִךְ <WH8074> and thy desolate places וְאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> and the land הֲרִֽסֻתֵ֑יךְ <WH2035> of thy destruction כִּ֤י <WH3588> for עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> now תֵּצְרִ֣י <WH3334> shall even now be too narrow מִיּוֹשֵׁ֔ב <WH3427> by reason of the inhabitants וְרָחֲק֖וּ <WH7368> shall be far away מְבַלְּעָֽיִךְ׃ <WH1104> and they that swallowed thee up

ע֚וֹד <WH5750> will yet יֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> the other shall say בְאָזְנַ֔יִךְ <WH241> again in thine ears בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> The children שִׁכֻּלָ֑יִךְ <WH7923> which thou shalt have after thou hast lost צַר־ <WH6862> [is] too strait לִ֥י הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> The place גְּשָׁה־ <WH5066> for me give לִּ֥י וְאֵשֵֽׁבָה׃ <WH3427> to me that I may dwell

וְאָמַ֣רְתְּ <WH559> Then shalt thou say בִּלְבָבֵ֗ךְ <WH3824> in thine heart מִ֤י <WH4310> Who יָֽלַד־ <WH3205> Who hath begotten לִי֙ אֶת־ <WH853> אֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these וַאֲנִ֥י <WH589> I שְׁכוּלָ֖ה <WH7921> me these seeing I have lost my children וְגַלְמוּדָ֑ה <WH1565> and am desolate גֹּלָ֣ה ׀ <WH1473> captive וְסוּרָ֗ה <WH5493> and removing to and fro וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> these מִ֣י <WH4310> Who גִדֵּ֔ל <WH1431> ? and who hath brought up הֵ֤ן <WH2005> behold אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I נִשְׁאַ֣רְתִּי <WH7604> these? Behold I was left לְבַדִּ֔י <WH905> alone אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these אֵיפֹ֥ה <WH375> alone these where הֵֽם׃ <WH1992> like פ

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold אֶשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> Behold I will lift up אֶל־ <WH413> to גּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> to the Gentiles יָדִ֔י <WH3027> mine hand וְאֶל־ <WH413> to עַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> to the people אָרִ֣ים <WH7311> and set up נִסִּ֑י <WH5251> my standard וְהֵבִ֤יאוּ <WH935> and they shall bring בָנַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH1121> thy sons בְּחֹ֔צֶן <WH2684> in [their] arms וּבְנֹתַ֖יִךְ <WH1323> and thy daughters עַל־ <WH5921> on כָּתֵ֥ף <WH3802> upon [their] shoulders תִּנָּשֶֽׂאנָה׃ <WH5375> shall be carried

וְהָי֨וּ <WH1961> become מְלָכִ֜ים <WH4428> And kings אֹֽמְנַ֗יִךְ <WH539> shall be thy nursing fathers וְשָׂרֽוֹתֵיהֶם֙ <WH8282> and their queens מֵינִ֣יקֹתַ֔יִךְ <WH3243> thy nursing mothers אַפַּ֗יִם <WH639> to thee with [their] face אֶ֚רֶץ <WH776> toward the earth יִשְׁתַּ֣חֲווּ <WH7812> they shall bow down לָ֔ךְ וַעֲפַ֥ר <WH6083> the dust רַגְלַ֖יִךְ <WH7272> of thy feet יְלַחֵ֑כוּ <WH3897> and lick up וְיָדַ֙עַתְּ֙ <WH3045> and thou shalt know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יֵבֹ֖שׁוּ <WH954> for they shall not be ashamed קוָֹֽי׃ <WH6960> that wait ס

הֲיֻקַּ֥ח <WH3947> be taken מִגִּבּ֖וֹר <WH1368> from the mighty מַלְק֑וֹחַ <WH4455> Shall the prey וְאִם־ <WH518> Or שְׁבִ֥י <WH7628> captive צַדִּ֖יק <WH6662> or the lawful יִמָּלֵֽט׃ <WH4422> delivered

כִּי־ <WH3588> Surely כֹ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> But thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD גַּם־ <WH1571> Even שְׁבִ֤י <WH7628> Even the captives גִבּוֹר֙ <WH1368> of the mighty יֻקָּ֔ח <WH3947> shall be taken away וּמַלְק֥וֹחַ <WH4455> and the prey עָרִ֖יץ <WH6184> of the terrible יִמָּלֵ֑ט <WH4422> shall be delivered וְאֶת־ <WH854> with יְרִיבֵךְ֙ <WH3401> with him that contendeth אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I אָרִ֔יב <WH7378> for I will contend וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּנַ֖יִךְ <WH1121> thy children אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I אוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <WH3467> with thee and I will save

וְהַאֲכַלְתִּ֤י <WH398> And I will feed אֶת־ <WH853> מוֹנַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH3238> them that oppress אֶת־ <WH853> בְּשָׂרָ֔ם <WH1320> thee with their own flesh וְכֶעָסִ֖יס <WH6071> as with sweet wine דָּמָ֣ם <WH1818> with their own blood יִשְׁכָּר֑וּן <WH7937> and they shall be drunken וְיָדְע֣וּ <WH3045> shall know כָל־ <WH3605> and all בָּשָׂ֗ר <WH1320> and all flesh כִּ֣י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> that I the LORD מֽוֹשִׁיעֵ֔ךְ <WH3467> [am] thy Saviour וְגֹאֲלֵ֖ךְ <WH1350> and thy Redeemer אֲבִ֥יר <WH46> the mighty One יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> of Jacob ס
